StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetNROTCPreShipView]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @NROTC int = NULL AS
SELECT P.PERSON_ID, N.NWA_ID, C.CONTRACT_ID, P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME + COALESCE(SPACE(1) + P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS APPLICANT_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER AS SSN, OSS.ORGANIZATION_ID AS OSS_ID, OSS.NAME AS OSS_NAME, COALESCE(MC.GENDER_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS GENDER, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(6), C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, 12), SPACE(0)) AS CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, OC.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE AS CLASS, OC.CLASS_NUMBER AS INCREMENT, COALESCE(CC.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION, SPACE(0)) AS PROGRAM, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(6), PFT.PFT_DATE, 12), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_DATE, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), PFT.PFT_RUN_MINUTES), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_RUN_MINUTES, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), PFT.PFT_RUN_SECONDS), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_RUN_SECONDS, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), CASE MC.GENDER_CODE WHEN 'M' THEN PFT.PFT_PULLUPS WHEN 'F' THEN PFT.PFT_HANG END), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_PULLUPS_HANG, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(3), PFT.PFT_CRUNCHES), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_CRUNCHES, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(3), PFT.PFT_SCORE), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_SCORE, SD.STATUS_DESCRIPTION, SD.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT C INNER JOIN NWA N ON (C.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID AND C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate) INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON (N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @NROTC) INNER JOIN PERSON P ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON (N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.STATUS_TYPE = 'O' AND CS.STATUS_CODE = 'F' AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = dbo.GetMaxStatusID(CS.NWA_ID)) INNER JOIN STATUS_DISPOSITION SD ON (CS.STATUS_TYPE = SD.STATUS_TYPE AND CS.STATUS_CODE = SD.STATUS_CODE AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = SD.DISPOSITION_CODE) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION OSS ON N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = OSS.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PFT ON (N.NWA_ID = PFT.NWA_ID AND PFT.PFT_ID = dbo.GetMaxPFTID(N.NWA_ID)) LEFT OUTER JOIN OCS ON (C.NWA_ID = OCS.NWA_ID AND OCS.OCS_ID = dbo.GetMaxOCSID(OCS.NWA_ID, 'Y')) LEFT OUTER JOIN OCS_CLASS OC ON OCS.OCS_CLASS_ID = OC.CLASS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMPONENT_CODE CC ON OCS.COMPONENT_CODE = CC.COMPONENT_CODE
